function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of coordinated innovation in territorial development may hinder progress in local productivity structures.","Impact":"Reduced economic development and growth within the territory.","Mitigation":"Establishing effective partnerships between SMEs, public agencies, and large enterprises to facilitate innovation and productivity.","Technologies":"Collaborative technology platforms for sharing resources and knowledge.","People":"Local businesses, public agencies, and residents of the region.","Owner":"Local government, innovation networks, and research institutions."},{"Description":"Inadequate promotion of alternative technologies with low environmental impact may lead to unsustainable development practices.","Impact":"Increased environmental degradation and resource depletion.","Mitigation":"Promoting and incentivizing the adoption of alternative technologies with low environmental impact through awareness campaigns and policy support.","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, sustainable production methods, and green infrastructure.","People":"Residents, businesses, and local authorities in the region.","Owner":"Local government, environmental organizations, and educational institutions."},{"Description":"Lack of feasibility studies and planning for the implementation of innovative projects may result in ineffective and unsustainable outcomes.","Impact":"Wasted resources, time, and potential negative environmental and social impacts.","Mitigation":"Conducting thorough feasibility studies, engaging stakeholders, and implementing adaptive planning processes for innovative projects.","Technologies":"Feasibility assessment tools, collaborative planning platforms, and stakeholder engagement technologies.","People":"Project coordinators, stakeholders, and the local community.","Owner":"Universities, research institutions, and project coordinators."}]}
